name: nativescript-phaser
description: Build awesome 2D games with Phaser.js and NativeScript

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-phaser && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-phaser && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.local.dev: npm i ../../nativescript-browser-polyfill/src && npm i ../../nativescript-canvas-plugin/src && cd ../demo && npm i ../../nativescript-canvas-plugin/src && cd ../demo-angular && npm i ../../nativescript-canvas-plugin/src
scripts.pub.dev: npm i nativescript-browser-polyfill@latest && npm i nativescript-canvas-plugin@latest
